page.title: 15SOUTH LEVERTON
page.content: South Leverton is a village to the north of the survey area.Its sister village of North Leverton with Habblesthorpe lies further on. South Leverton is very much a separate community to the villages already described.Children go to school at North Leverton and generally, there is little to link the two regions of the area. Some housing development has taken place in the village but people have to travel out of the village to work.Many people will be employed at Rampton Hospital, or one of the Trentside power stations.Recently a private nursing home has opened in the village.There are several farms in the area, and the village is surrounded by open fields.
